dct_description_sm: Area along South Branch of Rancocas Creek between Fairmont Ave and Johnson Ave

Map shows lots and streets. Advertisement of land saying the proximity to Philadelphia and Hainsport Station and a description of lots. Information is given on the train including frequency and fares. The Camden and Burlington County Railroad is drawn with some roads and also Lake Bishop.
